import pandas as pd
from blockingpy.blocker import Blocker

geco_df = pd.read_csv("geco_3_dup_per_rec_1.csv") # org 15000, dup 5000, 4 modifications per record
geco_df

geco_df['txt'] = (
    geco_df['first_name'].fillna('') +
    geco_df['second_name'].fillna('') +
    geco_df['last_name'].replace('puste', pd.NA).fillna('') +
    geco_df['region'].fillna('') +
    geco_df['birth_date'].fillna('') +
    geco_df['personal_id'].fillna('')
)

###deduplication

blocker = Blocker()
result = blocker.block(geco_df['txt'], ann='faiss')

print(result)
print()
print(result.result)

###Linking datasets

df = geco_df.copy()
df_org = df[df['rec-id'].str.endswith('org')]
df_dup = df[df['rec-id'].str.endswith('org') == False]

blocker = Blocker()
link_result = blocker.block(x=df_org['txt'], y=df_dup['txt'], ann='faiss') #euclid

print(link_result)
print()
print(link_result.result)

###true_blocks eval

df_eval = geco_df.copy()

df_org_1 = df_eval[df_eval['rec-id'].str.endswith('org')]
df_dup_1 = df_eval[df_eval['rec-id'].str.endswith('org') == False]

df_org_1['x'] = range(len(df_org_1))
df_dup_1['y'] = range(len(df_dup_1))

df_org_1['record_id'] = df_org_1['rec-id'].str.extract('(\d+)')
df_dup_1['record_id'] = df_dup_1['rec-id'].str.extract('(\d+)')

matches = pd.merge(
    df_org_1[['x','record_id']],
    df_dup_1[['y','record_id']],
    on='record_id'
)
matches['block'] = range(len(matches))

blocker = Blocker()
eval_result = blocker.block(x=df_org_1['txt'], y=df_dup_1['txt'], ann='faiss',verbose=1, true_blocks=matches[['x', 'y', 'block']])

print(eval_result)
print("="*56)
print(eval_result.confusion)

deduplication eval - true_blocks

df_eval = geco_df.copy()

df_eval['block'] = df_eval['rec-id'].str.extract(r'rec-(\d+)-')
df_eval['block'] = df_eval['block'].astype('int')
df_eval = df_eval.sort_values(by=['block'], axis=0).reset_index()
df_eval['x'] = range(len(df_eval))

df_eval[['rec-id', 'x', 'block']].head(15)

result = blocker.block(x=df_eval['txt'], ann='faiss', true_blocks=true_blocks_dedup, verbose=1)
